## Data Sets

### [World Athletics](https://world-athletics-database.camminady.dev/)

Some 400k+ entries with performances of track and field athletes.


### [Tour de France](https://thomascamminady.github.io/LeTourDataSet/)

Every cyclist and stage of the Tour de France (up to including 2022) in two CSV files.


### [Alltime Athletics](https://github.com/thomascamminady/alltime_athletics_python)

Scrapes Peter Larsson's website Alltime Athletics.


### [Abiturnoten data set](https://github.com/thomascamminady/abiturnoten)

German Abitur: Grade distribution over time.


## Code

### [dicopal](https://thomascamminady.github.io/dicopal/)

A collection of colors, an homage to the dicopal.js project. This website allows you to quickly browse a variety of color palettes and just copy their hex codes.



### [coolors preview](https://coolors.streamlit.app)

Preview color palettes from [coolors.co](https://coolors.co).
